resources.string: * PLEASE NOTE: Prices are only a general indication of tolls for vehicles with tags. Always check your account.
This blue circle is how a selectable road will look.
This green circle indicates that you have selected the toll entrance/exit.
Under Settings, you can alternate between a Map view and a Text view of the toll exits.
You can select the type of vehicle to further customize the toll report.
* PLEASE NOTE, If you have no data connection this app will still function, but only in the Text view.
An internet connection is required for up-to-date tolls.
